data.title: St. Clair College
data.meta_description: St. Clair College is the place to start your journey in pursuit of your career & lifelong learning. It's where you'll learn new things, expand your mind, experience college life, and most importantly, get the skills and knowledge you need to get the job!
data.text:
Your Investment

The standard tuition and compulsory fees for the current academic year:

Fall 2024 Intake Tuition Fees

For programs with Experiential Learning (Work Placement/Internship): Costs for accommodation, if needed, travel and related expenses are at the student's own expense. It is recommended for most programs, that students have access to a laptop or desktop computer while away from home during experiential learning periods.

Textbooks and other materials are in addition to Tuition Fees. Textbook prices may be found on the Bookstore website.

Please be aware that tuition and compulsory fees are subject to adjustment each year. The College reserves the right to change, amend or alter fees as necessary without notice or prejudice.

The program statuses listed below are for Fall 2024
